full_text:
I've been diving deeper into NFL and football analytics as I learn #rstats using #nflverse data. There is so much of this Mean Girls behavior from the more established football content creators it's ridiculous.

Giving Max a follow! https://t.co/dyQcOFqG0V

Wanted to put out my Pillboxes charts, but the data isn't available yet, so you get Snap Count charts instead. 

Tight ends first. Travis Kelce. He's the man. Gray with an uptick in snaps as well. Fortson took the normal amount of Fortson/Bell snaps. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/bV9zVSTOXR

Wide receivers next. Sorry this one got so crowded. Didn't expect both Kemp and Ihmir-Marsette to show up. Moore and Kemp both with season highs in both counts and percentages. MVS was a hero yesterday. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/5zPhFeZx5U

Running backs. I am surprised this was as close as it was. Sure felt to me like Pacheco was out there most of the time. Pacheco was clearly hurting on some snaps, so I wonder if Jet had something wrong too, or if they just really liked Pacheco against Cincy. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/0rCGkmhUlj

Patrick Mahomes' journey to the Hall of Fame continues after his 5th Championship Game! 

Check out his EPA/play stats game by game. From rookie sensation to Super Bowl LVII bound, this chart shows his remarkable consistency.

#nflverse #ChiefsKingdom #ggplot2 https://t.co/fMZk2lprJP

Praise be to the #nflverse gods!! They've fixed the data issue!! It's pillboxes time!! 

KC offense vs CIN. 

We lost Toney on the second drive. Mecole and JuJu both injured on second drive of the third quarter. MVS took all but one snap after Hardman went out. 

#rstats https://t.co/GPMM393BTc

KC defense. Sneed injured on the first drive. Gay left the game in the third, covered as usual by either Harris or Cook. Clark missed a handful of snaps to start the second, but then powered through basically the rest of the game. Mostly same for Jones. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/N4Bl265DLB

Cincy's charts. Looks like Chase played all of the snaps, and Higgins came very close to that. Boyd went out middle of the second quarter. Looks like that was their only injury. Interestingly, they went 6 OL for a random 2nd and 1st down play late in the game. 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/e8BwsSpIbV
